title: 070 - NickelBACK
description: On today's show, the guys discuss their accommodations while in Orlando as Pat prepares for his NXT debut, they discuss the announcement that Nickelback is releasing a new song and album, and how incredible it would be if they had a reunion tour with Creed. They also dive into a packed Pod FOD with a lot of movie talk to help send you into the weekend. Send in your questions to the FOD at @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram and subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for clips from the show. We appreciate you guys for listening. Have a good weekend.
